 2019-06352019-06-02,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of RICHARD DICERNI, C.M., of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to serve as Chairperson of the Interim Management Advisory Board for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis.
